Dialogue.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogue.Text: Later that night, when you're getting ready for bed, you're surprised to find Diana stopping by your nest to visit.

Dialogue.Speaker: Diana
Dialogue.Text: Hey, Phil. Homer gave me that Orchid you made me, and I just... wanted to say thanks for spending so much time with me lately, and being so nice. I've been thinking a lot about the future, and I had a question. A lot of herds are heading out lately... What are your thoughts about leaving the valley?

Dialgoue.Speaker: Phil
Dialgoue.Text: 1) Well... it is pretty messed up around here. 2) I think we could make it work here.

Dialogue.Speaker: Diana
Dialogue.Text: Yeah... I'm sure all these other T-Rex around here have been bothering you as much as they haveme. Maybe you're right.

Dialogue.Speaker: Diana
Dialogue.Text: You... really think so? You know... I think I needed to hear that. Thanks for listening, Phil.

Dialogue.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogue.Text: Later that night, when you're getting ready for bed, you're surprised to find Diana stopping by your nest to visit.

Dialogue.Speaker: Diana
Dialogue.Text: Hey Phil. I hope I'm not bothering you, I just thought I'd stop by. I actually had a question for you. I've been thinking a lot about the future lately. A lot of herds have been heading out of the valley lately... What are your thoughts on leaving?

Dialgoue.Speaker: Phil
Dialgoue.Text: 1) Well... it is pretty messed up around here. 2) I think we could make it work here.

Dialogue.Speaker: Diana
Dialogue.Text: Yeah... I'm sure all these other T-Rex around here have been bothering you as much as they have me. Maybe you're right.

Dialogue.Speaker: Diana
Dialogue.Text: Huh... You really think so? I'm not so sure... but I guess we'll have to see.
